# Core Rule 6 - No ban discussion or evasion [color=SlateGray][italic]Revision A, 2025-10-11[/italic][/color]
This is a zero tolerance rule.
You may only discuss bans at https://forum.spacestation14.com/c/ban-appeals/appeals-game/40
Unless you are completing antagonist objectives, do not evade role bans by gaining access to, impersonating, or taking over banned roles.
